title: Get a personalised career recommendation and plan

schema.description: In this questionnaire, we'll ask you about your current position, have you self-assess your skills and capabilities, and ask you about your interests and preferences.

title: Select which job title closely matches your current role

schema.help: We'll use this as a starting point and does not have to be an exact match.

title: Do any of the following criteria apply to you?

schema.help: This makes sure we can we provide relevant opportunities inline with essential job requirements.

options.title: I am of Aboriginal or Torres Strait Islander origin
I am a Designated Detective (hold an associate degree in Policing Practice)
I hold a current Australian Commercial Pilot licence (CPL) or Air Transport Pilot Licence (ATPL)
I am a registered General Practitioner or Physician
I hold a solicitor's practicing certificate

title: Do you have a specific role in mind that you'd like to move into?

schema.help: If you have a specific role or pathway in mind, let's explore how you can get there.

title: What role do you want to move into?

schema.help: We can explore how you might move into this role.

title: Are you looking for a policing, or non-policing role?

schema.help: This makes sure we can highlight opportunities within your relevant duties.

title: What other areas are you interested in?

schema.help: This helps us suggest roles within discipline areas that are interesting to you. You don't need to have any previous experience in these areas to be shown roles.

title: Are you more interested in being an individual contributor or a supervisor/manager?

schema.help: This makes sure we can highlight opportunities that match your preferred working style.

title: What matters to you when choosing a new role?

schema.help: This helps us create an accurate profile for you to prioritise your career opportunities.
